Name: NovaMundi: The Spear of Chaquén
About the game: NovaMundi: The Spear of Chaquén is an open-world RPG roguelike in which you lead a group of indigenous explorers and warriors making their way through vast and dangerous territories in the Andes, seeking to unite the Muisca populations against the first wave of Spanish invaders in the XVI century. The many populations of the Muisca territory stand divided and are constantly threatened by the nearby Panche and Muzo people. In this scenario, a run-down group of Spanish explorers has reached their land and seeks to profit from these divisions and conflicts to make alliances and ultimately gain control of it. Lead your party and avoid losing your way in the forest and misty mountains, recruiting new members while your veteran units become stronger. Discover the location of the Muisca towns, and convince their people to stand united. New adventures await you every time, as the game world is generated procedurally with unique variations and challenges.
